Spanish Example: Cuando era niño, yo veía muchos dibujos animados.
English Translation: When I was a child, I used to watch a lot of cartoons.
Did you used to watch that TV show?

Spanish Example: Mi abuela veía las noticias cada noche.
English Translation: My grandmother used to watch the news every night.
We used to watch movies on Saturdays.
Did you all (Spain) used to watch documentaries?

Spanish Example: Ellos veían pájaros en el parque.
English Translation: They used to watch birds in the park.

Spanish Example: Yo era muy tímido en la escuela.
English Translation: I was very shy in school.

Spanish Example: ¿Tú eras el mayor de tus hermanos?
English Translation: Were you the oldest of your siblings?

Spanish Example: Éramos buenos amigos en la infancia.
English Translation: We were good friends in childhood.

Spanish Example: Yo iba al parque todos los días.
English Translation: I used to go to the park every day.
Did you go to music classes?

Spanish Example: Mi hermana iba a la biblioteca después de clase.
English Translation: My sister used to go to the library after class.
We used to go to the countryside every summer.
Did you all (Spain) use to go to the gym?

Spanish Example: Ellos iban a nadar los domingos.
English Translation: They used to go swimming on Sundays.
